zone.line: To me above. I feel me ready
By a new way the air to press thro'
To new spheres, a purer existence.
This lofty life, this godlike happiness!
Thou, first yet a worm, & deservest it thou?
Yes, turn now the kind sons of Earth
?So unlock thy backs to!
Dare the gates to burst open
Here is the time thro actions to demonstrate
That the honour of Man not Gods height yields
For this dark Cavern not to tremble
thus
In which itself fancy to its own pain condemned
this through-course to struggle ?here
Roudnd whose narrow mouth entire Hell flames;
To this step |=| serenee to resolve upon
And, where is with danger, into n Nothing here to fly.
goblet
Now come down chrystalline pure phial
Out from thy lofty coverings
